units.description: send a text message via Clickatell
units.address:
text_message_clickatell( # look here to see other providers: https://github.com/rubenarslan/formr.org/wiki/How-to-send-text-messages-(SMS)
    survey1$mobile_phone_nr, # specify the correct field in the correct survey here
    paste0("Hi dear user, please take part in our study again: https://formr.org/YourStudy/?code=", # text for message
    survey_run_sessions$session), # access token
    "Your_Provider_Token");  # change this to your token
FALSE # this means that you will not retry sending the text message
